description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. All developer profits for the Xbox LIVE Indie Game Hot Potato Online will be donated to Child’s Play (childsplaycharity.org). Blast your opposition with a potato bomb while avoiding incinerating yourself in this original arcade sport! Enter the arena with three local or online friends and AIs in teams or free-for-all. Customize the match options and create your own arenas using the map editor.
